credit_line: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
title: Countryside with Trees and Distant Water
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
medium: Pen and black ink on off-white wove paper
description: Small hill in left foreground with two prominent trees. More trees in left distance, behind first set and hill. To the right, open land with rocks and (possible) fences, and then a second hill in right distance with third stand of trees. Further hills and mountains in far distance.
name: Sketchbook folio
